original_title: Chasing Bigfoot - The Quest for Truth
overview: For decades, grainy photographs and campfire stories told the story of a towering creature that lived in solitude in the forests of the Pacific Northwest, Canada, and around the world. But where some see a myth, others see a chance to make history. CHASING BIGFOOT â€“ THE QUEST FOR TRUTH, is a series that looks at the Bigfoot legend through the eyes of the true believers, who devote their lives to discovering the hidden truth and bringing home the evidence to prove it.
title: Chasing Bigfoot - The Quest for Truth
